inclusion.criterion: elective, urgent, or emergent cardiac surgery using cardiopulmonary bypass
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: baseline GFR less than 60 ml/min/1.73m2 estimated using the Modification of Diet in Renal Disease equation
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: cardiogenic shock (defined as a cardiac index less 2 L/min/m2 despite high dose inotropes or the need for intra-aortic balloon pump)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: received an infusion of sodium bicarbonate on the same day as cardiac surgery
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She was born at 38w3d of gestation, after an uncomplicated pregnancy.
